mapper.select: select employee_id, employee_name, associate_school, associate_college, associate_major, associate_career, associate_degree, undergraduate_school, undergraduate_college, undergraduate_major, undergraduate_major_second, undergraduate_career, undergraduate_degree, undergraduate_degree_second, master_school, master_college, master_major, master_career, master_degree, phd_school, phd_college, phd_major, phd_career, phd_degree, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_career_info where employee_id = #{employeeId}

select employee_id, employee_name, associate_school, associate_college, associate_major, associate_career, associate_degree, undergraduate_school, undergraduate_college, undergraduate_major, undergraduate_major_second, undergraduate_career, undergraduate_degree, undergraduate_degree_second, master_school, master_college, master_major, master_career, master_degree, phd_school, phd_college, phd_major, phd_career, phd_degree, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_career_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into archivesmanagementsystem.education_career_info(employee_name, associate_school, associate_college, associate_major, associate_career, associate_degree, undergraduate_school, undergraduate_college, undergraduate_major, undergraduate_major_second, undergraduate_career, undergraduate_degree, undergraduate_degree_second, master_school, master_college, master_major, master_career, master_degree, phd_school, phd_college, phd_major, phd_career, phd_degree, update_by, update_time) values (#{employeeName}, #{associateSchool}, #{associateCollege}, #{associateMajor}, #{associateCareer}, #{associateDegree}, #{undergraduateSchool}, #{undergraduateCollege}, #{undergraduateMajor}, #{undergraduateMajorSecond}, #{undergraduateCareer}, #{undergraduateDegree}, #{undergraduateDegreeSecond}, #{masterSchool}, #{masterCollege}, #{masterMajor}, #{masterCareer}, #{masterDegree}, #{phdSchool}, #{phdCollege}, #{phdMajor}, #{phdCareer}, #{phdDegree}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update archivesmanagementsystem.education_career_info
employee_name = #{employeeName},
associate_school = #{associateSchool},
associate_college = #{associateCollege},
associate_major = #{associateMajor},
associate_career = #{associateCareer},
associate_degree = #{associateDegree},
undergraduate_school = #{undergraduateSchool},
undergraduate_college = #{undergraduateCollege},
undergraduate_major = #{undergraduateMajor},
undergraduate_major_second = #{undergraduateMajorSecond},
undergraduate_career = #{undergraduateCareer},
undergraduate_degree = #{undergraduateDegree},
undergraduate_degree_second = #{undergraduateDegreeSecond},
master_school = #{masterSchool},
master_college = #{masterCollege},
master_major = #{masterMajor},
master_career = #{masterCareer},
master_degree = #{masterDegree},
phd_school = #{phdSchool},
phd_college = #{phdCollege},
phd_major = #{phdMajor},
phd_career = #{phdCareer},
phd_degree = #{phdDegree},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where employee_id = #{employeeId}
